Name: Heavy Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy. Can't target enemies too high off the ground.

Name: Brace
Description: Increases your defense against the next enemy's attack by 2.

Name: Dash Through
Description: Dash through all grounded enemies. (Damage is equal to stomp damage - 2.)
L2 Description: Ignores contact hazards, deals 1 more damage.
Infinite Stacking: Ignores contact hazards, damage is stomp + <var,2,-5>

Name: Flip Kick
Description: A special kick that can hit any position.

Name: Fluff Heal
Description: Gives the target Health Regen 4 for 3 turns.

Name: Sleep Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy and put it to sleep for up to 3 turns. Can't target enemies too high off the ground. (Sleeping enemies can't move and heal 10% of their max hp per turn, clamped between 2 and 10 hp.)

Name: Leafy Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy with leafy power. Can't target enemies too high off the ground. (<commontext,explainearth>)
L2 Description: Inflicts Attack Down 2 for 3 turns. Element damage formula changes: Boosted also by damage the target took this turn and last turn, cap is 1.0x base.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts Attack Down <var,2,-4> for 3 turns. Element formula changes: Treats debuffs as buffs, boosting based on party HP. Base damage is stomp + <var,2,-2>

Name: Under Strike
Description: Strike a low enemy from below, dealing Dark type damage (<commontext,explaindark>)
L2 Description: Hits twice, Second hit is a normal type stomp hit that has base damage equal to half your normal stomp damage. Second hit inflicts 3 defocus.
Infinite Stacking: Hits twice, Second hit is a normal type stomp hit that has base damage equal to half your normal stomp damage. Second hit inflicts <var,3> defocus. First hit damage base is stomp + <var,2,-2>, second hit is stomp/2 + <var,2,-4>

Name: Iron Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy from higher above. Deals bonus damage based on defense.
Infinite Stacking: Base damage is stomp + <var,1,3> + defense * level.

Name: Elemental Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy from higher above. Uses the element that will deal the most damage. (Base damage is 0.75 * (stomp + 2))
Infinite Stacking: Adds an additional element to the damage dealt. Element combination chosen is the combination that maximizes damage dealt. No change after level 6.

Name: Team Throw
Description: (Requires Wilex) Throw Wilex into an enemy in any position to deal massive damage. Damage is based on the stomp damage for both characters. (Base damage: stomps + 16)
Infinite Stacking: Base damage is both character's stomps + <var,6,10>

Name: Double Egg
Description: Lay up to two eggs. This move can only be used if you have at least 1 open inventory slot. (Eggs disappear from your inventory at the end of battle.)

Name: Smash
Description: Smash an enemy. Does 1 more damage if you have any attack increasing effects.

Name: Power Smash
Description: Smash an enemy with extra force.

Name: Dazzle Smash
Description: Smash an enemy and make it dizzy for up to 3 turns. (Dizzy enemies will miss their attacks.)

Name: Hammer Throw
Description: Throw your hammer out to hit any position.

Name: Flame Smash
Description: Smash an enemy with flame element. (<commontext,explainfire>)
L2 Description: Element formula changes: Treats debuffs as buffs, boosting based on party HP.

Name: Flora Smash
Description: Smash an enemy with earth element. (<commontext,explainearth>)

Name: Momentum Smash
Description: Smash an enemy with a lot of momentum, hitting it into the enemies behind it in succession. Gives you 2 Absorb.

Name: Quake Smash
Description: Deal Earth damage to all grounded enemies. (Can also target enemies hanging off ceilings.) (<commontext,explainearth>)

Name: Light Smash
Description: Smash an enemy with light element. (<commontext,explainlight>)
L2 Description: Element formula changes: Bonus based on similar hp proportions, cap is 1.0x
Infinite Stacking: Element formula changes: Bonus based on similar hp proportions, cap is 1.0x. Base damage is smash + <var,3,3>.

Name: Illuminate
Description: Gives the targets Illuminate for 3 turns. (Illuminate gives you an attack boost, and the boost will increase after every turn you attack.)
L3 Description: Targets both, gives Parry Aura 1 for 3 turns
Infinite Stacking: Targets both, gives Parry Aura 1 for <var,2,-3> turns. Duration of both effects is <var,2,-3>

Name: Hammer Beat
Description: Heals 5 hp to all targets and gives 1 Absorb. Refunds your turn if it hits and action command is successful. Action command difficulty increases the more actions you have taken.
Infinite Stacking: Heals <var,3,2> health and gives you <var,1> Absorb.

Name: Mist Wall
Description: Cures and protects you from negative effects and reduces incoming damage by 33% for 3 turns.
L3 Description: Targets both, applies Bolster Aura 1 for 3 turns
